author: Source: Parliamentlive.tv
title: Commons Speaker ‘strongly opposed’ to Westminster Hall address by President Trump – video | Politics
text:
Commons Speaker ‘strongly opposed’ to Westminster Hall address by President Trump – video 
John Bercow, House of Commons Speaker, says he is ‘strongly opposed’ to President Trump delivering an address in Westminster Hall following the imposition of his ‘migrant ban’. Bercow added that an address by a foreign leader to both houses of parliament during a state visit was ‘not an automatic right, it is an earned honour’
Donald Trump should not be allowed to speak in UK parliament, says Speaker
